title: Whale hunting
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Peter Raymont and Mosha Michael
brief_description: An interesting and informative journey with six Inuit hunters in their hunt of the Beluga whale near Frobisher Bay, N.W.T. We learn about the methods used in pursuing the whale and dividing the carcass.
creator_credit_for_label: ONF | NFB, Peter Raymont and Mosha Michael
